title: Spacious Alcove Studio with Den/Doorman/Gym in Upper East Side
posting_body: ['PET-FRIENDLY | LIVE-IN SUPER | ROOF DECK | 20TH FLOOR GYM', 'Come view this beautifully renovated ALCOVE STUDIO WITH DEN located in the Upper East Side!', 'Apartment Features:', '• 550 sq.ft', '• Great closet space, eastern facing huge windows', '• Open concept Kitchen', '• Kitchen with features new appliances, granite countertops, and a breakfast bar', '• Den can be used as a reading nook, home office, dining area, or nursery', '• Bathroom features a three mirror vanity with great storage space, a timeless pedestal sink, and is fully tiled', 'Building Features', '• Full-time doorman building', '• On-site, clean laundry room with tons of windows', '• Steps to 6 train and M96 bus', '• Short Walk to Q,  Central Park', '• 20th floor gym w/ Peloton bike', '• Resident’s lounge with free wifi / usb ports / bathroom access', '• Pet friendly with no pet fees!', 'Perfect Work from Home oasis!!!', 'Landscaped roof terrace- remained open during Pandemic- free wifi for remote working – room for social distancing – exceptional views – peaceful respite from the city!', "Additionally, I have plenty of units available in Murray Hill, Midtown East , Hell's Kitchen, Gramercy, Upper West Side etc.", 'Including doorman and brownstone buildings with outdoor space, patios, balconies, laundry and more.', "If this isn't your ideal place, let me know", "and I'm certain I can find it!", 'Please call or text for access.', '929-388-9421 arailym']
